404Page.Message: We couldn't find the page you were looking for.

AboutUs.VersionMessage: We are under active development. You are using version

EventAdmin.Do you want to delete this event?: Do you want to delete this event?
EventAdmin.Do you want to renew the security key?: Do you want to renew the security key?

QRCode.Description: Generate and download a QR code that links directly to this event on O-Replay.
QRCode.Instructions: This QR code can be included in printed maps to make it easier to access the event in O-Replay.
QRCode.Title: Event's QR Code

EventAdmin.RenewEventTokenMsg: If you renew the security key, the old one will be invalidated. Therefore, no one with the old key will be able to upload results to this event.

DeleteStage.DialogBody: The stage and all of its results will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.
DeleteStage.DialogTitle: Do you want to delete this stage?

FootO.description: Time-based, individual or team, linear course.
FootO.title: Classic

OneManRelay.description: Time-based, individual or team, linear course where each participant runs it's own course.
OneManRelay.title: Forked course

Relay.description: Time-based team race with consecutive legs on different courses.
Relay.title: Relay

Rogaine.description: Point-based event, individual or team, on a score course. Time breaks ties.
Rogaine.title: Score

Totals.description: Combined point-based or time-based result across two or more stages.
Totals.title: Overall

WipeOutRunners.DialogBody: This will delete all of the results or start times uploaded to this stage. Afterwards, you can upload them again. This option is used to correct errors on uploaded data.
WipeOutRunners.DialogTitle: Do you want to reset this stage?

EventAdmin.TooLongMsg: The entered URL exceeds the maximum of {{count}} characters

GeneralErrorFallback.msg: Try refreshing the page. If the error persist, please try again later.
GeneralErrorFallback.title: An unexpected error happened

Name: Name

PrivateEventPage.Message: This event has been set to private by the organizer. If you believe this is an error, please contact the event organizer.

RadiosExperimentalMsg: When using online controls, split-related features are experimental.

PointsTable.OnlyForClasses: Points view is accessible only in the class-based view.

SplitsTable.NoRunnersWithSplits: No runner has downloaded their chip
SplitsTable.OnlyForClasses: Splits table is accessible only in the class-based view.

Points.HelpMsg: Points obtained by 1000-point formula: 1000*(winner's time / your time)

WrongFileUploaded.Msg: The timekeeper has uploaded final results without splits. These files should not be uploaded and may cause missing or incorrect data to be displayed. More information on how to upload results to our service can be found on the <2>Organizers</2> page.
WrongFileUploaded.Title: Results Without Splits!

Sign in.NoAccount: Don't have an account? Sign Up

ThisFunctionalityNotImplementedMsg: This feature has not been implemented yet.

chart.selectRunnersMessage: Select runners to view the chart

lineChart.noData: Select runners to view the line chart

positionChart.caption: * Position 1 at the top (best), higher numbers lower (worse)
positionChart.noData: Select runners to view position evolution
